text: Had several lessons with Jordy. He is a great coach. Is  very patient and fun. Highly recommended!

Jordy was an excellent tennis coach. I had never had any lessons before and he was so patient & encouraging during our sessions.I highly  recommend him & his team if you are thinking of starting your tennis journey or refining your some existing skills.
Jordy is amazing at teaching and structuring his classes to work on form, technique, and all aspects of the game. he also makes tennis fun, i enjoy all my sessions with Jordy!! ðŸŽ¾

Jordy is a great tennis coach - patient and effective in teaching form and technique, astute in his observations on areas where I might be able to improve on and has a nice sunny personality where I look forward to lessons each week.  I've improved meaningfully under his guidance.  He also still loves the game!

Although I have been playing tennis for many years, Jordy is able to improve my technique to help with my game. Our whole family takes lessons with him and we enjoy playing matches with him at the tail end of each session. When I first started lessons with Jordy, I did inform him that we don't like ball feeding from the basket the whole lesson and prefer more live play. He has been able to tailor the lessons to our needs. He is also easy going and fun to play with.
